A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Garbage movie......horrendously boring. It wasn't even good as a standalone film. I really wanted to like this movie and I even enjoy the prequels in all their mess and glory but the utter disregard and disrespect to the original material was so baffling and disgusting I really hope they leave Star Wars alone. I rather have them stop at the prequels if it me they wouldn't destroy this story with such trash. 

I'm completely baffled at the great divide between the critics and audiences reviews. How is it that with the ratio of 
good to bad reviews of this film that the aud
ience rating is still hanging on to 50%?! Rotten Tomatoes not allowed to let the true rating show due to contractual obligations to Disney?! Please save your money folks. 

 It's a shame that I was so pumped for this movie and now I have no interest to see the next episode because they have given us nothing to look forward to. How can you keep people's interest if you add nothing of substance to the story and there is no growth in the characters we're told we have to care about it. Trim the fat\, make the characters interesting and give them something to do that progresses the story in a meaningful way.
